name: Iona Capital Ltd
overview:
Iona Capital provides equity and subordinated debt into waste projects which have a renewable element. This may include the production of methane gas for conversion into electricity or heat and the recovery of recyclable materials. We develop strategic partnerships and use sector-specific expertise and financial skills to achieve profitable growth for our investors who range from individuals to large local authority pension funds.

We have set up a team who have the expertise to evaluate and advise on the best investment opportunities this sector presents. The strong industry knowledge within our team is augmented through the partnerships we have formed that extend from our investment base, which embraces many of the industry key players within the SME market, to the broader advisor community. Utilising this knowledge base our approach is to help shape the investments through proactively advising at an early stage in the project inception how to optimise investor returns. The typical form of our support will include financial structuring, procurement and general commercial advice. We will also provide strategic sector advice to both our investor and investment base.
